title: Marriott Rewards Members Get Exclusive Access to the NBA Global Games 2015 in Shenzhen and ShanghaiTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Marriott Rewards Members Get Exclusive Access to the NBA Global Games 2015 in Shenzhen and Shanghai  
Marriott International has announced that it is bringing its partnership with the National Basketball Association (NBA) to China and is offering exclusive NBA Global Games experiences to Marriott Rewards members in China. Not only will selected Marriott Rewards Members receive VIP tickets to watch the games between the Los Angeles Clippers and Charlotte Hornets, the two teams featured in NBA Global Games China 2015, they will also receive invitations to attend private functions with the teams and NBA Legends visiting China as part of Marriott’s Members Get More program.
 
Two Meet & Greet sessions, one in Shenzhen and one in Shanghai, will be held exclusively to select Marriott Rewards Members providing them with the opportunity to interact, take photos and get autographs with NBA Players and Legends. In Shanghai on October 13th, at the Fan Appreciation Day, select Marriott Rewards Members will have the opportunity to watch the Hornets and Clippers conduct practice and participate in on-court games.
 
To enrich the experience of NBA fans in Shanghai, a special NBA theme menu will be served in The Lounge at the Marriott Shanghai City Centre Hotel on the evening of October 13th. An NBA photo booth will be set up for guests in The Lounge to take photos and share the fun on social media.
 
“Our partnership with the NBA is another example of how Marriott Rewards has taken a step forward to reinvent the way we engage global experience seekers, travelers and sports fans who enjoy the excitement of the NBA,” said Anka Twum-Baah, Marriott International’s Asia Pacific Vice President Customer Loyalty and Content. “We are extremely delighted that the NBA Global Games is coming to China where we have millions of NBA fans and we can create truly one-of-a-kind experiences for our members.”
 
In August, Marriott International and the NBA launched the partnership, which makes the global lodging company the Official Hotel of several marquee NBA events around the world, including NBA Global Games 2015-16, NBA Africa Game 2015, and NBA Canada Series 2015. Marriott is the first company to partner with the NBA across international games on five different continents.
 
Source:- Marriott
